response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value to you at $15,000. I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. To make this opportunity more attractive, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. This is a fantastic deal considering the high value you see in the product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
